---
title: "Cultural Program"
format: html
---

Lund is one of Sweden’s oldest cities, rich in history, culture, and tradition. During the congress (28 July – 1 August 2025), participants are invited to join a curated cultural program to experience the historical and cultural depth of the region.

👉 [Register here for cultural activities](https://registration.invajo.com/95c54a9f-a2a1-4f76-94f5-7f81ce5aacc2?page=00cc0dfd-5380-49ae-9016-80f710a44290) (Required for all pre-registration events except the Fun Run)

## 🗓️ Special Events

<details>
<summary style="font-size: 1.1em; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer;">Tuesday, 29 July – Guided City Walk</summary>

- **Time:** 18:00–19:30  
- **Meeting Point:** Outside AF-Borgen (main conference venue)  
- A walking tour through Lund’s medieval streets. Includes Lund Cathedral, university landmarks, and historical sites.  
- *Pre-registration required. Limited spaces. Fee: SEK 80*

</details>

<details>
<summary style="font-size: 1.1em; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer;">Thursday, 31 July – Guided Walk & Skissernas Tour</summary>

**Guided City Walk of Lund (Second Route)**  
- **Time:** 18:00–19:30  
- **Meeting Point:** Outside AF-Borgen (main conference venue)  
- Alternative route to explore new corners of historic Lund.  
- *Pre-registration required. Limited spaces. Fee: SEK 80*

**Skissernas Museum Tour**  
- **Time:** 18:00–19:00  
- **Location:** Finngatan 2, Lund  
- Discover how public artworks are conceptualized and produced.  
- *Pre-registration required. Limited spaces. Fee: SEK 100*

</details>

<details>
<summary style="font-size: 1.1em; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer;">Friday, 1 August – Archaeology & Fun Run</summary>

**Archaeological Experience at Uppåkra**  
- **Time:** 09:00–12:00 (approximate)  
- **Location:** Uppåkra Archaeological Centre (transport from central Lund at 09:00, exact location TBA)  
- Guided visit + optional hands-on digging at one of Scandinavia’s most significant Iron Age sites.  
- *Pre-registration required. Limited spaces. Fee: SEK 280*

**WEHC Fun Run**  
- **Time:** Meet at 16:45 for a 17:00 start  
- **Meeting Point:** AF-Borgen  
- A 6km scenic loop through Sankt Hans Backar, ending at Inferno bar for a casual gathering.  
- *All levels welcome. Registration required.*

## 🏛️ Daily Free Cultural Offerings {#daily-free-cultural-offerings-28-july--1-august}

<details open>
<summary style="font-size: 1.1em; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer;">Click to view museums open to all participants</summary>

### Kulturen Open-Air Museum  
- **Location:** Tegnérsplatsen 6, Lund  
- **Open:** Daily  
- **Admission:** Free for WEHC participants  
- Sweden’s cultural history, historic buildings, and gardens.

### Skissernas Museum  
- **Location:** Finngatan 2, Lund  
- **Open:** Tuesday–Sunday 11:00–17:00  
- **Admission:** Free for WEHC participants  
- World's largest collection of sketches/models for public art.

### Historiska Museet (Lund University Museum)  
- **Location:** Krafts torg 1 (next to Lund Cathedral)  
- **Open:** Tuesday–Sunday 12:00–17:00  
- **Admission:** Free for WEHC participants  
- Archaeological collections, medieval exhibits, and university history.

</details>

## 🌿 Additional Local Highlights {#additional-local-highlights}

<details>
<summary style="font-size: 1.1em; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer;">Click to view recommendations for independent exploration</summary>

- **Lund Cathedral:** Romanesque cathedral from the 12th century.  
- **Botanical Gardens:** Free-entry garden close to the conference venue.  
- **Streets of Lund:** Explore the cobbled streets, historic houses, and independent shops.

</details>
